A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I cannot begin to describe how disappointed I was in this film. Hands down some of the worst writing I have ever experienced. Sad in such an iconic franchise that I grew to love over the years . This film\, Rian Johnson\, Disney just killed the entire star wars franchise in this long dragged out\, pointless 2 1/2 hour movie. 1 1/2 Stars for the beautiful picture\, everything else and I mean everything else was completely horrific to watch. I don’t know how they come back from this. Hopefully JJ is a wizard and can fix this catastrophe created in TLJ. In my opinion the damage has been done\, R.I.P. Starwars.
